name: Pixel-Point DEMO
description:
Pixel-Point is a arcade style top down shooter where you blast your way through a abandoned facility while fending off enemies!

This is just a demo of the full game which is still in development. The game is being made by LegacyPixel (me)! I hope that you enjoy the game!

Recommended specs:

Processor: Intel core i5-2400

GPU: Nvidia GT 710

RAM: 4GB
